forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost after 2am. Partly cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. North wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost before 9am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 9pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. East southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. South southeast wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
